distorCont.rpPosName: West Coast Ocean Data Portal Coordinator

distorOrdPrc.resFees: None. No fees are applicable for obtaining the data set.

idCitation.resTitle: West Coast Commercial Trawl Groundfish Rockfish Conservation Areas (RCA), 2015

dataIdInfo.idAbs: These data delineate Commercial Trawl Groundfish Rockfish Conservation Areas (RCA) off the West Coast of the United States for 2015. These areas are closed to commercial fishing for groundfish with trawl gear. Closures may vary seasonally. Boundaries are lines that connect a series of coordinates that approximate particular depth contours. North/south boundaries are designated by specific lines of latitude. Keep in mind that RCAs are fairly dynamic and may change as often as 5 times per year. See http://www.westcoast.fisheries.noaa.gov/fisheries/management/groundfish_closures/rockfish_areas.html for the latest information. This data set is a companion data set to: "West Coast Commercial and Recreational Fishing Closures, 2015," West Coast Commercial Groundfish Non-Trawl Rockfish Conservation Areas (RCA), 2015," "West Coast Commercial Non-Groundfish Trawl Rockfish Conservation Areas (RCA), 2015," and "West Coast Drift Gillnet Protected Resource Closure Areas, 2015."
dataIdInfo.idPurp: These data were developed to support the mission of the West Coast Ocean Data Network. Expected uses for these data are for regional resource management, impact assessment, policy development, and ocean planning. The data are not legal boundaries and should not be used to determine if fishing for specific species and/or with specific gear is allowed at a certain location.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Bureau of Ocean Energy Management (BOEM), Department of the Interior, generously provided funding for data development. Sound GIS developed the data set. Source data providers include NOAA National Marine Fisheries Service. Special thanks to all West Coast Ocean Data Network members who participated in the data needs assessment and review process.

idPoC.rpPosName: West Coast Ocean Data Portal Coordinator

LegConsts.useLimit: Distributor assumes no liability for misuse of data.

Consts.useLimit: The data are not legal boundaries and should not be used to determine if fishing for specific species and/or with specific gear is allowed at a certain location.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Environment as of Metadata Creation: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.2 (Build 3552) Service Pack N/A (Build N/A)

report.measDesc: Attributes were reviewed for consistency by comparing all unique values within each attribute.
Data set is considered complete for existing Commercial Groundfish Rockfish Conservation Area closures/restrictions in effect as of June 2015.
Attribute values were reviewed for accuracy by agency representatives from NOAA.
A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.
A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set is not applicable.

prcStep.stepDesc: Converted .csv files to GIS line features representing approximate fathom contours. Created associated latitude line boundaries, stretching from shoreline to EEZ boundary. Merged fathom lines and latitude lines to create closure polygons.

enttyp.enttypd: Table containing attribute information associated with the data set.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
